job_title: Build ML Model for Whiskey Tasting App - AI & Machine Learning
cover_letter:
Integrating a smart, flavor-based recommendation system into Whiskey Hub is a fascinating challenge, especially given the nuanced preferences of whiskey enthusiasts. My experience as a Co-Founder and Lead Developer at Xenodex Sciences, where I developed a scalable inference pipeline for automated behavioral classification, aligns well with your need for a robust recommendation engine. Additionally, my work with Vesper in building systematic trading strategies demonstrates my ability to apply machine learning models effectively in production environments.

I can deliver a recommendation system that not only predicts user ratings with precision but also provides insightful sensitivity analyses to enhance user engagement. By leveraging collaborative and content-based filtering techniques, I can ensure that Whiskey Hub users receive personalized recommendations that reflect their unique flavor profiles. Moreover, my proficiency with tools like Scikit-Learn, XGBoost, and FastAPI will facilitate seamless integration into your existing React Native app.

Let's discuss how I can contribute to making Whiskey Hub the go-to app for whiskey aficionados.
